item.title: Choosing a video player for the Nexus 10
item.description: So, I made the leap and I bought a tablet, a Google Nexus 10 to be more precise. Up until now I used vPlayer and the default video player on my Android Phone (galaxy S2) but on the tablet the default video player is very poor (or let's say simple) and vPlayer showed some weird artifacts, so to the search it is. I choose from other roundups and recommandations the following: BsPlayer FREE DICE Player MoboPlayer MX Player VLC Beta vPlayer All those players offer a nice, clean interface with similar basic functionality: resume position, some offer network playback, but not all video formats play the same in all players.
